import React from 'react'; import './HomePage.css'; const HomePage = () => { const furnitureItems = [ { id: 1, name: 'Modern Sofa', image: 'download.jpeg', description: 'Comfortable and stylish modern sofa.' }, { id: 2, name: 'Wooden Table', image: 'download1.jpeg', description: 'Elegant wooden dining table.' }, { id: 3, name: 'Cozy Armchair', image: 'download2.jpeg', description: 'Perfect for your reading nook.' }, ]; return (

); }; export default HomePage;
